Strength Training for Runners

Build the strength, power, and resilience you need to run faster, longer, and injury-free. Our runner-specific strength program targets the muscles and movement patterns that matter most for running performance.

Start Building Strength Learn More

Why Runners Need Strength Training

Strength training isn't just for bodybuilders. It's essential for runners who want to perform at their best and stay injury-free.

Improved Performance

Increase power output, running economy, and overall speed through targeted strength work.

Injury Prevention

Strengthen weak links and correct imbalances to reduce injury risk significantly.

Better Durability

Build resilience to handle higher training loads and longer distances.

Enhanced Stability

Improve core strength and stability for better running form and efficiency.

Program Components

A comprehensive approach to runner-specific strength development.

Core & Stability

  • Anti-rotation exercises
  • Plank variations
  • Single-leg stability work
  • Dynamic balance training

Lower Body Power

  • Squats and variations
  • Single-leg exercises
  • Plyometric training
  • Hip strengthening

Upper Body & Posture

  • Postural strengthening
  • Shoulder stability
  • Upper back strengthening
  • Arm swing mechanics

Injury Prevention

  • Glute activation
  • Calf strengthening
  • IT band prevention
  • Achilles strengthening

Training Schedule

Flexible programming that fits into your running schedule.

Beginner

2 sessions per week
  • 20-30 minute sessions
  • Bodyweight exercises
  • Form focus
  • Progressive loading
Most Popular

Intermediate

3 sessions per week
  • 30-40 minute sessions
  • Added resistance
  • Plyometric elements
  • Sport-specific movements

Advanced

4+ sessions per week
  • 40-50 minute sessions
  • Complex movements
  • Periodized training
  • Performance optimization

Success Stories

See how strength training has transformed our athletes' running.

"After years of recurring IT band issues, the strength program finally fixed my problems. I'm now running pain-free and faster than ever. The hip strengthening made all the difference!"
David Kim
Marathon Runner
"The strength training gave me the power I was missing in my kick. My finishing speed improved dramatically, and I feel so much stronger on hills. Game changer!"
Lisa Thompson
Competitive Runner
